pr_title: [JENKINS-63847] Use line separator from agent OS instead of master OS

timeline.message: [JENKINS-63847] Use line separator from agent OS instead of master OS

Revert "[JENKINS-63847] Use line separator from agent OS instead of master OS"

This reverts commit 357847dc3ed61321ad1f72c44ab9481084a03303.

timeline.bodyText:
IIUC from 
  
    
      kubernetes-plugin/src/main/java/org/csanchez/jenkins/plugins/kubernetes/pipeline/ContainerExecDecorator.java
    
    
         Line 371
      in
      18d73fb
    
    
    
    

        
          
           String sh = shell != null ? shell : launcher.isUnix() ? "sh" : "cmd"; 
        
    
  


Seems a bit fragile, since shell could in principle be overridden on Windows, but OK. Maybe clearer to introduce a constant here.
timeline.author: jglick
